thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: OK Media Group
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by OK Media Group

author: OK Media Group
title: OK Media Group
text:
We are committed to excellent customer service at OK Media Group, so it's always great to work with businesses with similar values, and Flashbay are just such a business.
Lisa was super-helpful from our first enquiry, sending out a comprehensive price list and sample pack, through to following up to make sure we were happy with our products (which we absolutely were).
